metadata.title: CVE-2012-6617 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: The prepare_sdp_description function in ffserver.c in FFmpeg before 1.0.2allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via vectorsrelated to the rtp format.

criterions.comment: mythtv package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
gst-libav1.0 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
